item.title: Intermediate to Advanced LAMP developer at FontShop.com (downtown / civic / van ness)
item.description:
FontShop is the leading typeface retailer on the web. We operate numerous properties, including FontShop, FontStruct and FontFeed. We are seeking an intermediate to advanced LAMP developer.

Location: SoMa / San Francisco - near 9th & Howard Streets

Position Responsibilities:
* Design applications / new functionality with availability and scalability in mind
* Implement features that improve customer experience and usability
* Interface with designers, content managers and business managers
* Work with QA to test code and resolve issues before going live

Required Skills:
* Experience in PHP 5 and object oriented programming
* Experience in with MySQL and relational databases
* Experience in HTML, Javascript and CSS
* Experience with Subversion
* Strong communication and collaboration skills

Additional Skills (optional, based on experience):
* Experience with application and database high availability requirements
* Experience with firewalls, security, networking and infrastructure requirements
* Experience with content management implementations
* Experience with internationalization / globalization
* Experience with advertising and search engine optimization
* Experience with mail systems and newsletter distribution solutions
* Experience with Agile methodologies

To apply:
* Be an individual contributor: no responses from agencies or development companies
* Send an email to dev underscore resume at fontshop dot com
* Include an inline, plain-text version of your resume
* Required: Include a few words about yourself and that connect your experience to our company and requirements
 * A web-based version of your resume is also acceptable, but please: no attachments
